entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
